name: Reclaim The Caves Demo
description:
RECLAIM THE CAVES is a 2D action platformer where you play as a dwarf hell-bent on taking back the caves that once belonged to his ancestors.  Battle through nine rooms on each floor to reach the boss and reclaim that area for the dwarfs.

This version of the game currently has two floors each with unique themes and ten rooms including a boss room. The final release will contain five or more floors each with their unique themes.
